Name: Backstab
Description: The `flanking` status grants an extra +1 if using a weapon of heft 0.

Name: Boot Toss
Description: If your first action of a battle is to throw a dagger, +4 on that attack.

Name: Deep Slice
Description: Expend 1 FP: Heighten an effect that causes `bleeding` to cause `hemorrhaging` instead on an attack from a dagger.

Name: Quick Throw
Description: Draw and throw a dagger as a single action.
